basics.name: Laurent Keith Villanueva
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Intern for the County of Kauai Information Technology Department
highlights: Utilized a cloud based device management system to remotely push applications to 20+ devices
Employed network analysis tools to create a map of Wi-Fi signal strength areas within the central office building for efficient placement of future wireless access points
Imaged and deployed 20+ computers to 5+ different county office locations around the island of Kauai
Recorded the serial numbers of nearly 800 hard drives and packaged them for proper recycling
Network with current industry professionals across various fields to gain valuable insight into current tech careers
Closely collaborate with a mentor to explore potential career paths and interests through monthly meetings
Actively participate in various career workshops aimed to develop soft skills and resume building practices
Competed in various capture the flag competitions
Placed in the 79th percentile in the National Cyber League (NCL) Spring 2024 Team Game
Placed in the 78th percentile in the NCL Fall 2024 Individual Game
Placed in the 91st percentile in the NCL Fall 2024 Team Game
Placed 67th in the NCL Spring 2025 Team Game
Develop skills in various Linux tools for vulnerability exploitation and information gathering

awards.title: Cisco Certified Support Technician (CCST) Certification
awards.summary: Certification of basic connectivity and troubleshooting skills of Cisco networking devices
